data.message: Say what you want, we won the fight.

replies.message: Still lost the war when you die.
^ Only GOD can do the judging you idiot!
You didn't win the fight. God is watching all that is happening. May God be with you. For it is written the Holy Bible on what is the truth. And nothing but the truth.

I don't believe in your god nor the bible. So don't try looking after me. You're the perfect example on why I don't believe. Plus like I said I'd rather be in hell than be with ignorant people like yourself in "heaven"
A queer that's also an atheist?? No! Didn't see that one coming!
Now I will carry on with my fabulous day, put my Versace sunglasses on and smile. I am very proud of my country today and that's all that matters.
What fight?

Oh you didn't hear? 
SECTION 3 on DOMA was struck down and prop 8 was dismissed. You should really start watching the news ;)
Right because death is absolute? It's called a soul and when someone dies, another person is born...straight and gay.
which fight? the one that decided who recieves tonight?

Yes
Your dad

Attention all you straight people with the negative comments towards this new moment in history: 
You are now the minority. That's it.
lmao, I'm not scared of God because I don't think he exists. Why am I afraid of something that I don't believe in? lmao!
yea thanks, my brothers boyscout troop shut the door when gays were allowed in scouting. you may have won the fight but you are destroying everything in your path
Read your comment again, you sound ridiculous. Have a wonderful day.
That's a fact sodomites wont make it into Heaven! you loose! But its my hope you repent of your sins and make it with the good guys! :)

I'm sure you got your girl pregnant before you married if you're in fact married. Oh you bore me with your nonsense of heaven. I do not want to go to heaven if it means all you pricks are going to be there.
And it's "lose" not "loose" you poor moronic excuse for a "man".
Your the one that sound ridiculous! see who has the most likes on your comments you or him??????
I see I'm debating with a mentally ill person, my apologies.

People arguing about something that has nothing to do with them are ridiculous. Your lives will not change with the repeal. Your way is not the correct way. It's the way you choose. And how about some spelling lessons for the people here? And should I have people "like" my comment in order for it to count?

What ever happened to our 1st amendment rights??  Remember what it clearly states? This is America! It is a FREE COUNTRY last time I checked. That makes it right too speak one's mind FREELY!!!! and if no one likes it, well It's just too bad. Get over it......
